teams.description: Leading the dynasty with charisma and poise, and probably being the best looking of the bunch. However his win columns is not something anyone is jealous of.  You like turnovers? He's got 'em.
His claim to fame is that Virginia Tech ball is somehow better than the rest of the ACC.  He finally came down from the mountains of Blacksburg and nestled in SEC country where they play real ball.
Oftentimes considered the league doormat, watch out, the glare of the screen late at night disturbs his wife Jenny as he looks for his next tactic to use on Youtube.
achievements: Turnover ratio king - just not in his favor
teams.favoritePlayStyle: 'I just hope I don't get skunked'

teams.description: Natural gamer.  His head can't contain all that ego. He'll always tell you what you're doing wrong, unless you're playing him.
achievements: Most pass yards in a game
teams.favoritePlayStyle: Hurr Durr I like da air raid

teams.description: A bit of an unknown. Father to two. He married someone with the same name as him. I can only imagine to free up space in his head for his elite play calling.
teams.favoritePlayStyle: Just be better than another 8-4 Tarheels football season

teams.description: Current reverend - but everyone is afraid to check if he renewed his license.  Dude knows ball.  But can he play it?
achievements: Want to know a random fact about an offensive line from 1983? Dan can help
teams.favoritePlayStyle: He Says balanced, stats say otherwise
